log_emotion_angry_description: You feel intense annoyance, displeasure, unhappiness, or dislike
log_emotion_anxious_description: You feel worried, nervous or uneasy because you don't know how something is going to turn out
log_emotion_apathetic_description: You feel no interest, enthusiasm, or concern
log_emotion_appreciated_description: You feel someone is grateful for what you did or what you are
log_emotion_apprehensive_description: You feel worried or fearful that something bad or unpleasant will happen
log_emotion_ashamed_description: You feel of little worth because of who you are or what you've done
log_emotion_awkward_description: You feel uncomfortable but don't know exactly why

log_reminder_descprition: Set up a daily reminder notification, so you never miss your pixel.
notification_reminder_body: Tap here to track your today's mood.
onboarding_step_0_body: Pixy provides you with the best tools to identify your mood patterns.
onboarding_step_1_body: The calendar view is your home at Pixy. It helps you to keep an overview of all days you tracked with your pixels. You can add new entries by tapping on a day.
onboarding_step_1_button_1: I used a Mood Tracker before
onboarding_step_1_button_2: I never used a Mood Tracker
onboarding_step_2_body: The statistics view helps you to identify highlights in your mood. They support average overview, peak detection and correlation analysis.
onboarding_step_3_body: The filters help you to find specific entries. You can filter by mood, tags, or search for specific words.
onboarding_step_4_body: Set up a daily reminder, so you never miss to track your pixel.
onboarding_step_5_body_1: We track anonymous data to find errors and to improve the app.
onboarding_step_5_body_2: We will remain ad-free and will never monetize your data.
onboarding_step_5_body_3: A paid subscription is planned to cover development cost.
onboarding_step_5_body_4: Your data will be stored only on this device by default.
onboarding_step_5_body_5: You can export or delete your data at any time.
onboarding_step_5_title: We take privacy serious and handle your data with care.
passcode_forgot_description: Unfortunately, we can't reset your passcode. If you lost your passcode, there is no way to recover your data.
passcode_forgot_reset_confirm_descriptio: This will erase all your data and settings for this app.
privacy_content:
Pixy gives you the ability to reflect on your day and store potentially sensitive information. I want to be as transparent as possible on the usage of your data. So allow me to explain how the data is used and why your data is safe.

### We donâ€™t have access to your tracked information

Your data is saved locally on your device. It is never shared with anyone except if you choose to export it or use the webhook functionality.

### Error Logs

**To find issues and maintain stability, we look at reported error logs.**

We collect error logs with the service provider Sentry. It gives us the possibility to see the time, the screen opened and the type of the device. We use this to reproduce the error and to provide a fix.

### Behavioral Data

When you open a screen or change a setting, this will be sent to one of our analytics tools. This data is sent anonymized. None of your personal data is sent. For example, if Laura Birmingham tracks her mood. We only see that user 101029 did this action.

We use Posthog Cloud to collect and visualize data. It helps us to better understand trends and to find areas for improvement.


---------

If you have any questions or concerns, drop me a line at [care@pixy.day](mailto:care@pixy.day).

**I use this app by myself and I would never want to share personal data with any developer.**

tags_feedback_body: Tags are a new way to categorize your data. You can add up to 30 unique tags to your entries. They are planned to be used in statistics in the future. Please send me your feedback below. I read every single message from you.
tags_feedback_question: How do you like the new tags feature?
tags_reached_max: You reached the maximum of {{max_count}} tags. Please delete some tags to add new ones.
title: Title
view_log_message_empty: A mysterious day, since it has nothing to reveal about itself.
year_in_pixels_description: My average mood of each day in {{date}}
log_messasge_hint_1: Compared to the day before, your mood went {{word}}. Do you know why?

log_view_changed_body: You can now use the [+] button on the top to add multiple entries. If you have multiple entries per day, a list will be displayed, otherwise only one entry will be displayed in this detail view.
behavioral_data_help: The data is collected anonymously and never shared with third parties. If you would like to support future development of the app, I recommend keeping this option enabled.
archive_tag_description: Hides the tag in your check-in. It's still visible in your past entries. This will also exclude this tag from any statistical analysis in the future.
colorblind_disclaimer: This color scheme is optimized for colorblind people based on the research of Dr. Cynthia Brewer from Pennsylvania State University. If you still have trouble seeing the colors, please let me know at care@pixy.day.
statistics_sleep_quality_chart_highlight: Your sleep quality over the last 14 days.
beta_different_checkins_body: I'm testing different check-in types now. Please let me know what you think about the new check-in types.
bot_question_emotion_details_text:
According to Harvard Health, writing about your emotions can help you cope with stress, anxiety, and depression.

Do you want to reflect on why you felt this way?
bot_question_introduction_text: Do you feel ready to give some details about how you felt?
bot_question_emotion_answer_empty: I leave this empty for now.
bot_question_rating_text: So, how was your day until now?
bot_question_rating_response_positive: I'm glad to hear something went positively ðŸ˜Œ
bot_question_rating_response_negative: It sounds like today was a tough one. You're not alone and I'm here to support you.
bot_question_rating_response_neutral: I'm glad to hear you're doing ok.
bot_question_sleep_quality_response_posi: I'm glad to hear you slept well ðŸ˜Œ
bot_question_sleep_quality_response_nega: It sounds like you didn't sleep well. You're not alone and I'm here to support you.
bot_question_sleep_quality_response_neut: I'm glad to hear you had a ok sleep.
bot_question_emotions_text: Do you want to add emotions you felt?
bot_question_emotions_answer_empty: I don't want to add emotions
bot_question_emotions_answer_skip: I don't want to add emotions
bot_question_tags_text: Do you want to add some tags?
bot_question_tags_answer_empty: I don't want to add tags
bot_question_tags_answer_skip: I don't want to add tags
bot_intro_text_2: I'm so happy to see you today. ðŸ«¶
bot_text_outro: That's it for now. I hope you enjoyed this check-in.

Awesome, almost done. 

Do you want to add any feedback? May I can do something better?
